sentences.en: A cat is not so vigilant as a dog.
A pilot must remain vigilant at all times.
sentences.cn: 飞行员必须随时保持警惕。

sentences.en: A vigilant hand had, as usual, kept the fire alive and the lamp trimmed.
sentences.cn: 细心的仆人象往常一样, 已把火弄得很旺,台灯也擦得干干净净.

sentences.en: A vigilant police force helps to control crime.
sentences.cn: 一支警惕着的警察队伍有助于遏制犯罪.

sentences.en: He has to learn how to remain vigilant through these long nights.
sentences.cn: 他得学会如何在这漫长的黑夜里保持警觉.

sentences.en: He warned the public to be vigilant and report anything suspicious.
sentences.cn: 他警告公众要提高警惕，遇到任何可疑情况都要报告。

sentences.en: If this is true, we must certainly be vigilant.
sentences.cn: 这如果是事实, 就很值得我们警惕!

sentences.en: Ms Winfrey has always been a vigilant steward of her brand.
sentences.cn: 温芙蕾女士一向对自己的品牌管理警醒.

sentences.en: Nothing slipped past his vigilant ear, or his comprehending mind.
sentences.cn: 他的听觉非常灵敏,头脑反应很快,所以什么事都瞒不了他.
每个人必须随时提高警觉.

sentences.en: Please remain vigilant at all times and report anything suspicious.
sentences.cn: 请时刻保持警惕，有可疑情况随时报告。

sentences.en: The dog kept a vigilant guard over the house.
sentences.cn: 这只狗警醒地守护着这所房屋.

sentences.en: The police said that the public should be vigilant.
sentences.cn: 警方说公众应保持警惕.

sentences.en: The weather was bad, but Lord Beaverbrook was vigilant.
sentences.cn: 天气不好, 但比弗布鲁克勋爵是很谨慎的.

sentences.en: These are not the only points to which you look for vigilant watchfulness.
sentences.cn: 这些并非是诸位选择机警的看守者的唯一条件.

sentences.en: We must be on our guard, watchful, prepared, vigilant.
sentences.cn: 我们必须当心 、 警惕 、 有准备和警醒.

words.tran_cn: 义务警员；治安维持会成员

trans.tran_cn: 警惕的，警觉的，警戒的，机警
trans.tran_en: giving careful attention to what is happening, so that you will notice any danger or illegal activity
